author: Garrey Dawson
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Place the cherry tomatoes onto a baking sheet, sprinkle over the remaining ingredients and stir to coat the tomatoes. Place in the oven and roast for ten minutes, or until softened. Spoon into a bowl and serve as a side dish.
